name: Shoebill Coin
description: Shoebill Coin ($SHBL) is a memecoin built on Solana blockchain. We love Shoebill, cute birds and animals, so we believe that it is a great opportunity to utilize the meme power to raise attention about endangered species (yes, Shoebill is) and being friendly to our environment. We also held events on important world environment days. We hope blockchain could have more contribution to our world (For the Common Good) rather than just price and speculation.
